projectGridLines.title: Project 1  Title: Define optimized offline training roasters for Universities in Africa (26 countries),
projectGridLines.description:
Project 1

Title: Define optimized offline training roasters for Universities in Africa (26 countries)

Description: Melimu extensively work with universities in Africa in 26 countries, we run digital schools for them. Project is to define training roasters for all the universities considering constraints defined. 

Skill sets: Operations Management, Supply Chain Management 

Expected learning: Implementation of operation management in real-life and write algorithms 

Specific courses required for project execution: Operations Management

projectGridLines.title: Project 2  Title: Machine Learning Based Adaptive Learning Module
projectGridLines.description:
Project 2

Title: Machine Learning Based Adaptive Learning Module

Description: Use machine learning algorithms to analyze user preferences and suggest relevant learning content, fostering a continuous learning environment. 

Skill sets: Any programming language, Algorithms, Machine Learning, Data Science 

Expected learning: Real life exposure to real business problem.

Specific courses required for project execution: Algorithms, Machine Learning, Data Science
